languages.text: {n}Сержант только качает головой.{/n} "Вы как хотите, Ваш высокобродие, а не помогу! Не буду я спасать сволочей, которые меня и моих близких собирались оставить тут подыхать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант только качает головой.{/n} "Вы как хотите, Ваш высокобродь, а не помогу! Не буду спасать сволочей, которые меня тут оставить собрались!"

languages.text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант только качает головой.{/n} "Вы как хотите, Ваш высокобродие, а не помогу! Не буду я спасать сволочей, которые меня и моих близких собирались оставить тут подыхать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the louses who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

{n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt nur den Kopf.{/n} "Tut, was Ihr wollt, {mf|Sir|Madam}, aber ich helfe Euch nicht! Ich weigere mich, den selbstsüchtigen Abschaum zu retten, der mich und alle, die mir lieb sind, hier einfach verrecken lassen wollte!"
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt nur den Kopf.{/n} "Tut, was Ihr wollt, {mf|Sir|Madam}, aber ich helfe Euch nicht! Ich weigere mich, den selbstsüchtigen Abschaum zu retten, der mich und alle, die mir lieb sind, hier einfach verrecken lassen wollte!"

languages.text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête.{/n} « Faites ce que vous voulez, mais démerdez-vous sans moi ! Je refuse de sauver les enfoirés d'égoïstes qui comptaient nous laisser crever ici ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête.{/n} « Faites ce que vous voulez, mais démerdez-vous sans moi ! Je refuse de sauver les enfoirés d'égoïstes qui comptaient nous laisser crever ici ! »

languages.text: {n}军士只是摇了摇头。{/n}“随便您怎么说，长官，但我绝对不帮他们！我绝对不救这群自私的人渣！他们打算抛下我和我在乎的那些人，让我们等死！”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}军士只是摇了摇头。{/n}“随便您怎么说，长官，但我绝对不帮他们！我绝对不救这群自私的人渣！他们打算抛下我和我在乎的那些人，让我们等死！”

languages.text: {n}軍曹は、ただ首を横に振る。{/n} 「好きにされればよい。しかし私は協力しない！私や大事な人々を見殺しにしようとした利己的なクズを救うつもりはない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は、ただ首を横に振る。{/n} 「好きにされればよい。しかし私は協力しない！私や大事な人々を見殺しにしようとした利己的なクズを救うつもりはない！」

languages.text: {n}El sargento se limita a negar con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Haga lo que quiera, pero no voy a ayudar! Me niego a salvar a la escoria egoísta que estuvo a punto de dejarnos morir a mí y a mis seres queridos».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento se limita a negar con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Haga lo que quiera, pero no voy a ayudar! Me niego a salvar a la escoria egoísta que estuvo a punto de dejarnos morir a mí y a mis seres queridos».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, başıyla reddetmekle yetiniyor.{/n} "Siz bilirsiniz efendim ama ben kılımı kıpırdatmam! Beni ve sevdiklerimi ölüme terk etmeye kalkışan bencil pislikleri hayatta kurtarmam!"
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant simply shakes his head.{/n} "Do what you will, {mf|sir|ma'am}, but I'm not helping! I refuse to save the selfish scum who were about to leave me and those I hold dear here to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, başıyla reddetmekle yetiniyor.{/n} "Siz bilirsiniz efendim ama ben kılımı kıpırdatmayacağım! Beni ve sevdiklerimi ölüme terk etmeye çalışan bencil pislikleri kurtarmayı reddediyorum!"
